title: Spa Pantry Detox Herbal Blend, 1 lb
author: Universal Companies
description: Description Great for detox treatment wraps or baths, Spa Pantry® Detoxifying Herbal Blend is a special combination of invigorating herbs. 1 lb. Ingredients Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf, Allspice (Pimenta Officinalis), Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Purpose and Benefits Use for treatment wraps or baths.Naturally possesses the ability to pull toxins from the skin.
